select m.id from llm_single_mission m inner join llm_notification n on m.notification_Uid = n.uid where m.deleted = false and n.deleted = false and n.start_time <= now() and (m.pre_settlement_time is null or m.pre_settlement_time < CURDATE()) and (m.settlement_time is null or m.settlement_time < CURDATE()) and n.status = 'published' and (m.run_time is null or m.run_time <= CURDATE())
and n.type = #{reqVO.singleMissionType} and m.type = #{reqVO.singleMissionType}
and m.status = 'settlement_error'
and n.end_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 4 DAY)
and m.status in ('published','pre_settlement') and n.end_time >= now()
order by m.id
limit #{reqVO.limitSize}
